title: Vegan Takes Neighbor To Court Because He Cooks Meat Outdoors
text:
Vegan Woman Complaining About Meat Smells

A vegan woman in Australia is taking her neighbor to court because he keeps -- wait for it -- barbecuing stuff in his backyard. The smell of the meat and fish he's been cooking has apparently prevented her from enjoying her own backyard.

Cilla Carden, of Perth, has been in a court battle with neighbor Toan Vu and his family since last year.

Even Basketballs Are Too Much For Her

She's also complained about Vu's kids playing basketball in the backyard -- y'know, just living their lives.

Carden's court battle has so far led to nothing. Ladbible writes that her claims have been rejected by the Supreme Court of Western Australia, though her lawyer, John Hammond, says she could still take it to the country's Supreme Court.

Woman Says She Can't Go Outside

Carden has spoken to Australian news media, saying: "They've put it there so I smell fish, all I can smell is fish... I can't go out there."

"It's been devastating, it's been turmoil, it's been unrest, I haven't been able to sleep," she says.

Thanks For Ruining Everyone's Fun

Vu says he just wants to "keep the peace," and adds that he's moved the barbecue away from the backyard. Where it is now we can only guess.

Ladbible adds that Vu has told his kids to stop playing basketball, so that's nice.
